column4: can anyone tell me how to edit a file in the terminal, without using vi, or pico, etc.  just using like cat, and echo, etc. I know how to CREATE files, but now how to edit them..
- its much easier to vi / nano / pico than to use sed awk grep
i know  but I'm using webmin, and I cant use the javascript ssh client.. just a one line command for unix... so i cant use an actual unix text editor.
can't do that at my schools computers.
